description:
Consumption of sparkling wine

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73423 Sparkling wine tax statistics

Definition:
The consumption of sparkling wine with an alcoholic strength
by volume of 6% vol or more (standard rate) and of sparkling
wine with an alcoholic strength of less than 6% vol (reduced
rate) is calculated based on the quantity on which tax was
paid, minus tax relief. The figures on domestic sales of
sparkling wine (consumption) take into account all taxable
domestic and foreign sparkling wine varieties, including
sparkling fruit wines.
